name: Reflekt Me
description: A B2B SaaS platform enabling beauty and fashion brands to monetize their user and employee generated content by curating and displaying images that reflect untapped online communities, resulting in a 1% top-line revenue increase for large brands.
one_liner: A B2B SaaS platform enabling beauty and fashion brands to monetize their user and employee generated content by curating and displaying images that reflect untapped online communities, resulting in a 1% top-line revenue increase for large brands.
